# .github Directory

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration and documentation files.

## Files

### Workflows
- `publish-github.yml` - Automated publishing to GitHub Packages

### Templates (Coming Soon)
- `ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` - Issue templates for bugs and features
- `PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` - PR template for contributors

### Documentation
- `SUPPORT.md` - Support and contact information
